title: linotype fontExplorer x
content:
Is anybody using it?  
I tried it out and I ran into trouble but resolved it. Is it professional, what do you think?

 [‹ Wallau vs. Troy-- thoughts?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105919/http:/typophile.com/node/18817 "Go to previous forum topic") [Desktop Printer Advice ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105919/http:/typophile.com/node/18808 "Go to next forum topic")
author: PL

comments.content: I know it has a wealth of features. I want to know if somebody has moved their fonts to it and is working well.

Why don’t you try using the search function here? There has been a number of threads about Font Explorer X, here’s the most recent [thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105919/http:/typophile.com/node/18539). :^)
